titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, for the more speedy raising of the monies formerly imposed, and yet unpaid, within the City of London and liberties thereof. Die Lunæ, 23 Octobris. 1643. Ordered that this ordinance be forthwith printed and published. Jo. Browne Cler. Parliamentorum. H Elsyng. Cler. Parl. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, for the more speedy raising of the monies formerly imposed, and yet unpaid, within the City of London and liberties thereof. Die Lunæ, 23 Octobris. 1643. Ordered that this ordinance be forthwith printed and published. Jo. Browne Cler. Parliamentorum. H Elsyng. Cler. Parl. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament: for the speedy supply of monies within the city of London (pp. 11-18) has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous. This was apparently also published separately. Cf. Wing E2064.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
